paramInformation.label: Orientation
paramInformation.description: Controls the on/off orientation of the rocker switch

paramInformation.label: Remote Dim Level Increment
paramInformation.description: Number of dim levels to change for each dim step when remotely commanded

paramInformation.label: Remote Dim Step Duration
paramInformation.description: Interval between dimming steps when remotely commanded

paramInformation.label: Dim Level Increment
paramInformation.description: Indicates the number of levels to change dimming each step
